report.title: Smoking the Fly
report.author: Daytripper
report.bodytext: Smoked 1 bowl full of material in a water pipe. About 5 hits total. Smoked only the flesh scraped from red skin. /n /n Felt effects almost immediately. Very similar to marijuana. At first more focused, but as I type this 30 minutes later I'm a little dizzier and losing ability to focus. /n /n Sounds are enhanced. Eyes are watering more than usual. Getting a little jumpy. /n /n Overall, nice effect, seems to be a nice substitute for marijuana. Will definitely try again, probably blending with marijuana next time.
